posts.content:
markp wrote:wow

Looks fab

well done ..... and its a feel mile making when you know your bus is in good hands


Thanks for sharing

Ya keeping the picy pervs happy & the resto police too

Mark


Thanks Mark!

Hopefully once the sunroof is here later next month, the bus can start taking a more definite shape.
I'll keep you all updated

Guys,

Back with a small update:
Sunroof finally ordered - Was undecided for a while what color to go for. Finally decided to go for oyster color (beige). Really looking forward to see it installed on the bus.

Also, my 6 months secondment abroad are almost over - 3 weeks to go
Once I'm back I will be sure to post some pictures of the progress. I haven't heard any news from my dad, but then again I've been pretty busy with work lately.

One question for you guys.
I would like to know where I can perhaps find out the original manufacture date/ details for my bus... a certificate of sorts perhaps? I know she is a pre-October 58 bus, but nothing more specific. What/ where can I get it? (Really appreciate any help I get)

I will keep you all updated once I'm back home in Malta and can give out regular updates

Take care.

James
